Description: Ivory comb; the teeth are lost; the handle has been re-affixed.
Curator's comments: S.-A. Ashton, 6,000 years of African combs (Cambridge: Fitzwilliam Museum), 14, fig. 13.
Exhibition history: 2013 July - October, Cambridge, The Fitzwilliam Museum, Origins of the Afro Comb
Acquisition name: Bequeathed by: William Leonard Stevenson Loat
